replies.body: I'm interested in Warwick and Volibear buffs, but the nerf to Tiamat worries me, as it's vital for many champions in the jungle.

> [{quoted}](name=Salvor Hardın,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bgnUyNy,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-12-11T12:43:18.583+0000)
>
> I'm interested in Warwick and Volibear buffs, but the nerf to Tiamat worries me, as it's vital for many champions in the jungle.

For non meta junglers yes. But they need better help than this item anyway imo. Or put tiamat into the warrior line instead of caulfields

I see what they mean though. It's a pretty damn good item for both trading and waveclear. One of those generalist items. Probably gonna be shifting it from both strengths to just one or power down the item altogether and keep both strengths.

Many champions just have no need to upgrade Tiamat until their build is complete because Tiamat itself is all they need for clear and upgrading it doesn't increase trade potential much in most cases.

Or make it cost more.

It could easily have one of the long swords changed out for a pickaxe and cost closer to 2200 with 10 more AD.

> [{quoted}](name=Salvor Hardın,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bgnUyNy,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-12-11T12:43:18.583+0000)
>
> I'm interested in Warwick and Volibear buffs, but the nerf to Tiamat worries me, as it's vital for many champions in the jungle.

Could honestly just make it do bonus damage to monsters so it does less damage to minions but doesn't effect jungle clearing. That is of course, assuming they effect the AoE damage.
No GP. Even tho they promised it.
The reason behind that is supposedly that they want to see how GP will improve since they are nerfing Tiamat users.

> [{quoted}](name=Darkin Hybrid,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bgnUyNy,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-12-11T13:04:00.999+0000)
>
> The reason behind that is supposedly that they want to see how GP will improve since they are nerfing Tiamat users.

Tiamat Nerf does not affect Irelia, Aatrox, etc. So it wont do shit, but they have another excuse to yet not buff him.
I mean, it technically does affect Irelia top that rushes Tiamant.
I wouldn't fully agree with that, since Irelia rushes Tiamat first along with Jax, and others. It's bound to effect them somehow.

> [{quoted}](name=Darkin Hybrid,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bgnUyNy,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2018-12-11T14:11:53.467+0000)
>
> I wouldn't fully agree with that, since Irelia rushes Tiamat first along with Jax, and others. It's bound to effect them somehow.

Maybe their Waveclear, just maybe. But that doesn't stop them from oneshotting you.
????? Without a tiamat they won't even do damage to you. Especially Irelia with her weak ass abilities.

Yes, in fact. Considering that the Sheen proc will mostly likely be used up killing a minion before jumping on me, it's kind of useless and Tiamat is a much better first buy.

Also if Irelia is killing you like that you are playing wrong. Most top laners in the game will just chunk her as soon as she gets close. And trinity + Steraks + Tabis is 8200 gold. That's quite a while into the game. Stop her earlier. 70% of top laners have better early games than she does.

Most every Irelia rushes Tiamat.

Faster wave clear, more damage from stats plus active and preps nearby minions for Q.

If they nerf it too much it would be like deleting GP's barrels.
Meanwhile 0 {{champion:6}} nerfs

Is he still an issue? I personally haven't had any problems with him lately. I think the rune stat changes benefited everyone else more than him since he was already optimizing his stats. That and his optimized full health scaling stat is severely nerfed now (from I think 35 - 300 health to only being able to get 15 - 90, which he is ignoring in favor of the 5 armor).
he's going to be strong again when the only 2 bruisers that can deal with his shit are getting nerfed + getting their first item tiamat nerfed

Surely the best way to help those ADCs mentioned at the bottom is nerf Lucian and make Kai'Sa have more 'skill' beyond, press Q do damage, press R be safe. Those 2 and Ez have 30% play rates. Kinda shoving everyone else out to being niche picks in a role with only 17 champs in it anyway.
Some champions need to have  lower winrates in order for League to be an enjoyable game. Kai'Sa is one of them.
The biggest help would be to nerf mages itemizations. make it so one skillshot isnt OS guaranted anymore.
oh goodie, more pyke nerfs.  lol can't wait.

Tbh he's really strong, the rework they gave him was completely unnecessary (coming from a mastery 7 pyke player). Now he's being played as a solo laner in Mid Laner in higher elos, and even Jungle. He's not really a Support anymore when he can do everything himself now.

> [{quoted}](name=Darkin Hybrid,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bgnUyNy,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-12-11T13:06:11.552+0000)
>
> Tbh he's really strong, the rework they gave him was completely unnecessary (coming from a mastery 7 pyke player). Now he's being played as a solo laner in Mid Laner in higher elos, and even Jungle. He's not really a Support anymore when he can do everything himself now.

hat's the problem.  His kit is not a support one at all.  They're trying to shoe horn that kit into being an assassin, and as a support.  I don't think it'll work.

> [{quoted}](name=Hethalean,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bgnUyNy,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-12-11T18:28:20.893+0000)
>
> hat's the problem.  His kit is not a support one at all.  They're trying to shoe horn that kit into being an assassin, and as a support.  I don't think it'll work.

The main problem with Pyke is that he is an assassin, but has hard CC. So he either a really, really good assassin, or he is played as a tank.

> [{quoted}](name=Darkin Hybrid,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bgnUyNy,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-12-11T13:06:11.552+0000)
>
> Tbh he's really strong, the rework they gave him was completely unnecessary (coming from a mastery 7 pyke player). Now he's being played as a solo laner in Mid Laner in higher elos, and even Jungle. He's not really a Support anymore when he can do everything himself now.

That's a design issue. Pyke is not as good a support as solo lane. Give him gold and he thrives. I play him a lot toplane and its far better than any support pyke.

> [{quoted}](name=Hethalean,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bgnUyNy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-12-11T12:16:01.354+0000)
>
> oh goodie, more pyke nerfs.  lol can't wait.

Good. When any other champion is dominated 4 roles they get nerfed.

> [{quoted}](name=The thigh guy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bgnUyNy,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-12-11T19:56:46.099+0000)
>
> Good. When any other champion is dominated 4 roles they get nerfed.

He needs a rework.  No way he was ever going to be a support with that kit.

> [{quoted}](name=Hethalean,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bgnUyNy,comment-id=000000010001,timestamp=2018-12-11T21:38:24.251+0000)
>
> He needs a rework.  No way he was ever going to be a support with that kit.

I agree. The champion was litteraly only made for all the whiny midlaners who can only play mid/top mages/assassins who cried when they’d get auto filled and didn’t want to dodge and take a timer.
Heimer dominated 3 roles and Riot wanted to buff his W-R plus removing bugs, the karma of the story is that he got more bugs that have made him way worse, it's tragic.

> [{quoted}](name=saltran,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bgnUyNy,comment-id=000000010002,timestamp=2018-12-11T22:21:58.294+0000)
>
> Heimer dominated 3 roles and Riot wanted to buff his W-R plus removing bugs, the karma of the story is that he got more bugs that have made him way worse, it's tragic.

Heimer is aids on a stick. If I see that champion I will always pick syndra by default. Throw his dumb ass turrets under the tower and it dies instantly.

Edit cause autocorrect op
4? I only see him support and mid

> [{quoted}](name=Moody P,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1bgnUyNy,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2018-12-11T20:49:26.001+0000)
>
> 4? I only see him support and mid

He’s s or a tier in every role except adc. And tbh he’d probably be better than any traditional adc.
Cassiopeia nerf?
cant wait for -5 movement on kassadin

Hope they mostly nerf the waveclear part and maybe hit the active a bit so you really need to invest into the full item for that.
Lack of waveclear should be a meaningfull weakness on someone like jax or fiora, but atm you can nullfy that for 1200g

why is singed getting a buff , if singed has a bad winrate its because of new people trolling with him , while singed mains succeed with the champion. I think singed is fine , i really dont want 'NERF SINGED , NERF SINGED' to come back, when hes really strong , half the top lane role just gets cut.
Whyyyyy nerffff tiamaaatttttt :(

Why are they nerfing Tiamat? There are so many characters that aren't problematic (Renekton, Riven, Fiora, Kled, Rek'sai) that depend on this item in order to win their lane. Nerfing it will just make them even worse against Urgot, Aatrox, Viktor, and Jax. What is the reasoning behind this change? That item does NOT need to be nerfed.

This is my exact worry, they're are champions that are completely reliant on Tiamat/hydra yet will they get anything? No. Fiora has had to rush Tiamat since forever, and now that its getting nerfed because a few champions abuse it, i guarantee she will get zero compensation.
As hated as it is, the {{item:3077}} nerfs worry me for {{champion:164}} in the jungle. anyone else?
To be honest, I hate Camille jungle, but I love Tiamat on her for top lane so I'm sad anyway {{sticker:sg-janna}}
If they nerf tiamat they will need to buff Warwick's wave clear.

I use one jungler {{champion:427}}


There are LOTS of things he needs, the forbidden idol line buffs are going to help him for sure

Tiamat is the sole item keeping {{champion:48}} on life support. He can't push or clear effectively without it.

Feels bad man.
Warwick buffs but tiamat nerfs. Yay....
Buffs to singed and asol. Guess they really dont want people to enjoy their game anymore huh.

support {{item:3222}} {{item:3504}} {{item:3107}} buff?
in my league?

am i dreaming?

https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/420837862179864576/522162940640493579/Blank_ac07c9c51b2ecf24f833551cc9764490.gif

So we enchanters can be finally be relevant again?
Well on the bright side it’ll be an indirect nerf to Irelia.
